edu.iu.dsc.tws.tset.sources

Class HadoopSource<K,V,F extends <any>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.tset.sources.HadoopSource<K,V,F>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key
    V - Value
    F - InputFormat
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closable, SourceFunc<Tuple<K,V>>, TFunction<Tuple<K,V>,Tuple<K,V>>, java.io.Serializable

    public class HadoopSource<K,V,F extends <any>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SourceFunc<Tuple<K,V>>
    A Hadoop source for reading the values. If this source is used, we need to make sure the values returned by it can be used throughout the computations. The default Hadoop input formatters clear the values immediately after they are returned.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
